profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Duc Do Nguyen
profile.address: Cao Lo Street, Ward 4, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

objective.title: Career Objectives
objective.short_term: Improve web development skills and master frontend and backend technologies to create modern and efficient websites.
objective.long_term: Become a full-stack web development expert, lead major projects, and contribute to the company's product development strategy.

responsibilities: Learn the structure of a Laravel project and build a simple Laravel project.
Analyze the website and requirements provided by the leader.
Collaborate with team members to complete the project.
Optimize the code and test all functionalities.
Use Docker to build the project.
API Development: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using ASP.NET connecting SQL Server, serving customer requirements and internal applications.
API Testing: Utilized Postman to test and verify APIs, wrote test cases, and checked API functionalities to ensure accuracy and security.
Maintenance and Optimization: Responsible for maintaining and improving existing APIs, enhancing system performance and stability.
Team Collaboration: Worked closely with frontend and backend development teams, as well as stakeholders, to ensure projects were completed on time and met requirements.
Source Control Management: Used Git for source code management and version control, handling branching, merging, and resolving code conflicts.

projects.name: E-commerce website selling men's and women's fashion clothes
projects.description: Design an e-commerce website using the Laravel framework, connected to a MySQL database, utilizing HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Ajax, with VNPAY and MOMO integrated for electronic payments.

features.title: Features
feature: Product filtering, search, and comparison for customers.
Account registration and login for users.
Order management, tracking, and shopping cart features.
Admin panel with functionalities like product, category, promotion, and user management.

projects.name: E-commerce website selling children's clothes
projects.description: Design an e-commerce website using the Laravel framework, connected to a MySQL database, utilizing HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Ajax, with VNPAY integrated for electronic payments.
